sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:20:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. 2. In another bowl, whisk together milk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla extract. 3. Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients and stir until just combined. 4. Heat a lightly greased griddle or skillet over medium-high heat. 5. Pour batter onto the griddle, using approximately 1/4 cup for each pancake. 6. Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown. 7. Serve hot with maple syrup.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Global">eb81cf979755021069a3b6fce053af07</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Easy">fae0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>All-Purpose Flour (1 cup), Milk (1 cup),</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Breakfast">b08512df9751021069a3b6fce053afd4</meal_type> <name>Pancakes</name> <nutrition>Calories: 300, Protein: 8g, Fat: 10g, Carbs: 45g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Melt butter. 2. Prepare griddle or skillet.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:10:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:00:29</sys_created_on> <sys_id>34ac87979795021069a3b6fce053af9a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:10</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
